page.title: 12 NUTFIELD CHURCH SCHOOL
page.content: There are axproximately{150}children at{Nutfield}aged between{5_12 years.There are{6 teachers,}a {headmaster} and a{secetary.}We do lots of{sport}as we have a{big field}which the middle school children look out onto.It has lots of trees around it and looks onto{Lyttel Hall.}We have showers in the changing rooms which come in useful in{x country}runs.Most people enjoy the school meals, but if you don't then you can have packed lunches. The school is a modern building with{2 huts}one used as a store the other used as a music lesson room.You can play the cello, violin, flute, clarinet, brass instruments,and oboe.I enjoy going to{Nutfield}and I will be sad to leave.
